storyInfo:
Rhodes Island and the L.G.D. officially begin their campaign against Reunion.
Elsewhere in Lungmen, Blaze stands against a squad of Reunion members.

attributes.content: The Year 937
Duke Erik and Professor Lierland D. of Piesberg Parliamentary University published this co-authored paper in The Journal of Urban History ('Where Did We Come From?' Issue 44).
The paper discussed the results of a detailed analysis of a collection of weathered remains.
The investigation into Sargon Excavation Site 4 revealed a common origin for Infected quarantines and executions with the law itself.
That is to say, the suffering of the Infected predates even the emergence of the law.
Lungmen, Support Structure Level, Exit
Now, we must fight.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: If you can defeat me, it means some will be able to survive——
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I am willing to join Rhodes Island. I am willing to fight together with you against the enemies of the Infected, your way.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: This is my burden to bear.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: 8:50 A.M. - Four hours after the recapture of L. G. D. Headquarters - Near the Commandery Exit
L. G. D. and Rhodes Island Pharmaceuticals
Lungmen Search-and-Destroy Campaign - Final Phase
1. Control Reunion's movements within Lungmen. Complete under the direction of the L. G. D.
2. Mop up Reunion's forces still in Lungmen. Complete under the direction of the L. G. D.
3. Eliminate Reunion's operational commander, or their command influence. Complete under the direction of the L. G. D.
4. Eliminate the Reunion Movement before they can withdraw to the slums. Complete under a joint L. G. D. and Rhodes Island operation.
'...Attention all citizens... are performing an evacuation exercise...'
'...Those citizens who have failed to evacuate, please lock your doors, draw your curtains, and do not leave your homes...'
Does it have to be so loud?
Shoot that drone down already!
Now we're just caught up in an exercise? How dare they use such cheap tricks to cover up the exquisite terror I've worked so hard to formulate?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: And to repeat it over and over again in both Lungmen and Ursine tongues!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: I've had enough of these drones. Get! Hurry! Keep to the side streets!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Nothing from Scout Team 3 either!
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Assault's signal suddenly c- cut out...
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: We're losing contact with all our overwatch teams one by one!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Why! How!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Such an insult... such humiliation foisted upon our movement!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: But how, and why? Damn you, Lungmen! Damn the Lungmenites! Damn the uninfected!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: (I've never seen him so unstable like this.)
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: (Faust, do we still have a chance to retreat?)
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: (I'll make some space for you.)
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: (If it's just your run-of-the-mill cops with the L. G. D. plus Rhodes Island, we should be able to get away.)
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: (What do you mean? Who else could be out there?)
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Agh...! I can't believe this! I can't get through!!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: If I can't even issue orders to my teams, how am I supposed to win?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: (Someone is watching us. There is still more to this city.)
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: (Get ready. To survive.)
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: (Got it.)
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: (...Faust.)
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: (Hm?)
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: (We trust you.)
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: 9:20 A.M. - Rhodes Island patrol route near the L. G. D.
They're really leaving this to the Infected? Rhodes Island got a raw deal this time.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: And in Lungmen! Hmph. How could a city as big as Lungmen not have what it takes to fight off an invasion on its own?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Now they've got Infected fighting Infected on behalf of the normies...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Whatever. It's certainly not the first time.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hurry up and clear a path! Don't look back, just break through their defenses!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: If we can just get across this street, we have a shot at grouping up with the second brigade!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Don't give them a chance to return fire. There aren't many of us left——
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: And in a moment, there won't be any of you left.
What?!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Wh... who are you? Did you just drop out of the sky?!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Get back, get out of here! She... she might be able to fly!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: ...I really can't!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Identify yourself!
attributes.name: Guard

attributes.content: Use your scanner!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (Sorry, I have to deal with this first!)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Lungmen law enforcement, listen up! I am from Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hold your fire. I really don't want to have to deal with crossfire while I'm fighting.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I can handle this on my own. You head on to the next roadblock.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Okay then. Back to you guys.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What's up with this chick?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: I'll explain it to you. I'm sure you can figure it out. Probably.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (Deep breath)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I am Blaze, one of Rhodes Island's elite operators. My current objective is to cripple your combat capabilities.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The intentions with which you undertook this invasion of a foreign city-state notwithstanding, we aim chiefly to disarm you.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Setting aside the injuries and damages you have inflicted upon others, and attendant penalties, any attempt to resist at this point is pointless. Put down your weapons. You still have a chance.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Huh? What? You...
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: My fellow Infected, I give you a choice:
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Surrender at once, and I will escort you to Rhodes Island, and subsequently deposit you somewhere welcoming to Infected.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: She blocked it with her bare hands?!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Seeing as how you continue to resist, there's nothing more I can say.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: As if we'd just let you lock us up? How crazy are you?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: I'm not crazy! There's a time and a place for fight, and a time and a place for flight.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It's just that when you choose to fight, all I can do is fight back.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Either way, I don't need my chainsaw.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Sorry, I really don't want to fight my fellow Infected.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...it's so humid in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: This stupid cat... is using Arts! Her body's steaming up!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: My body? Guess again. Is it the air around me that's getting hot, or the air around you?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Let's take a Sami bath together. My treat.
attributes.name: Blaze
